author: Metro Sport Reporter For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Theo Walcott left red-faced as fans slam club for 'disrespectful' gesture vs Sutton United | Metro News

organizations.name: sutton united | metro news metro sport reporter for metro.co.uk

text:
Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Monday 20 Feb 2017 9:43 pm Theo Walcott did not have an Arsenal pennant to swap with Sutton United. (BBC Sport) 
Theo Walcott was left red-faced after he was not given an Arsenal pennant to give to Sutton Unitedâ€™s captain before kick-off on Monday evening. 
The gesture is a typical one between teams at either end of the football pyramid during the FA Cup and while Walcott received a pennant from Sutton captain Jamie Collins, the England international had nothing to give in return. 
Fans immediately picked up on Arsenalâ€™s faux pas and criticised the club over their â€™embarrassingâ€™ decision. 
On a brighter note for Walcott and Arsenal, the forward scored the second goal to secure a 2-0 victory at Gander Green Lane after Lucas Perez had put the Gunners in front in the first half. Sutton United v Arsenalâ€¦ UNDERWAY
